verses.text: Then \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* \w rebelled|strong="H6586"\w* against \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* the \w death|strong="H4194"\w* of \w Ahab|strong="H0256"\w*.

And \w Ahaziah|strong="H0274"\w* fell \w down|strong="H5307"\w* through a \w lattice|strong="H7639"\w* in his upper \w chamber|strong="H5944"\w* that \add was\add* in \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*, and was \w sick|strong="H2470"\w*: and he \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, \w Go|strong="H3212"\w*, \w enquire|strong="H1875"\w* of \w Baal-zebub|strong="H1176"\w* the \w god|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Ekron|strong="H6138"\w* whether I shall \w recover|strong="H2421"\w* of this \w disease|strong="H2483"\w*.

But the \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* to \w Elijah|strong="H0452"\w* the \w Tishbite|strong="H8664"\w*, \w Arise|strong="H6965"\w*, go \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to \w meet|strong="H7125"\w* the \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w* of the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*, and \w say|strong="H1696"\w* unto them, \add Is it\add* not because \add there is\add* not a \w God|strong="H0430"\w* in \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \add that\add* ye \w go|strong="H1980"\w* to \w enquire|strong="H1875"\w* of \w Baal-zebub|strong="H1176"\w* the \w god|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Ekron|strong="H6138"\w*?

Now therefore thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, Thou shalt not come \w down|strong="H3381"\w* from that \w bed|strong="H4296"\w* on which thou art gone \w up|strong="H5927"\w*, but shalt \w surely|strong="H4191"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*. And \w Elijah|strong="H0452"\w* \w departed|strong="H3212"\w*.\f + \fr 1.4 \ft Thou shalt…: Heb. The bed whither thou art gone up, thou shalt not come down from it\f*
¶ And when the \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w* turned \w back|strong="H7725"\w* unto him, he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, Why are ye \w now|strong="H2088"\w* turned \w back|strong="H7725"\w*?

And they \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, There \w came|strong="H5927"\w* a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to \w meet|strong="H7125"\w* us, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto us, \w Go|strong="H3212"\w*, turn \w again|strong="H7725"\w* unto the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* that \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* you, and \w say|strong="H1696"\w* unto him, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \add Is it\add* not because \add there is\add* not a \w God|strong="H0430"\w* in \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \add that\add* thou \w sendest|strong="H7971"\w* to \w enquire|strong="H1875"\w* of \w Baal-zebub|strong="H1176"\w* the \w god|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Ekron|strong="H6138"\w*? therefore thou shalt not come \w down|strong="H3381"\w* from that \w bed|strong="H4296"\w* on which thou art gone \w up|strong="H5927"\w*, but shalt \w surely|strong="H4191"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*.

And he \w said|strong="H1696"\w* unto them, What \w manner|strong="H4941"\w* of \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \add was he\add* which came \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to \w meet|strong="H7125"\w* you, and \w told|strong="H1696"\w* you these \w words|strong="H1697"\w*?\f + \fr 1.7 \ft What…: Heb. What was the manner of the man\f*

And they \w answered|strong="H0559"\w* him, \add He was\add* an \w hairy|strong="H8181"\w* \w man|strong="H1167"\w*, and \w girt|strong="H0247"\w* with a \w girdle|strong="H0232"\w* of \w leather|strong="H5785"\w* about his \w loins|strong="H4975"\w*. And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, It \add is\add* \w Elijah|strong="H0452"\w* the \w Tishbite|strong="H8664"\w*.

Then the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* unto him a \w captain|strong="H8269"\w* of \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* with his \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w*. And he went \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to him: and, behold, he \w sat|strong="H3427"\w* on the \w top|strong="H7218"\w* of an \w hill|strong="H2022"\w*. And he \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto him, Thou \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* hath \w said|strong="H1696"\w*, Come \w down|strong="H3381"\w*.

And \w Elijah|strong="H0452"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* and \w said|strong="H1696"\w* to the \w captain|strong="H8269"\w* of \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w*, If I \add be\add* a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, then let \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* come \w down|strong="H3381"\w* from \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*, and \w consume|strong="H0398"\w* thee and thy \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w*. And there came \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* from \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*, and \w consumed|strong="H0398"\w* him and his \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w*.

\w Again|strong="H7725"\w* also he \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* unto him \w another|strong="H0312"\w* \w captain|strong="H8269"\w* of \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* with his \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w*. And he \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* and \w said|strong="H1696"\w* unto him, O \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, thus hath the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Come \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w quickly|strong="H4120"\w*.

And \w Elijah|strong="H0452"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* and \w said|strong="H1696"\w* unto them, If I \add be\add* a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, let \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* come \w down|strong="H3381"\w* from \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*, and \w consume|strong="H0398"\w* thee and thy \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w*. And the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* came \w down|strong="H3381"\w* from \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*, and \w consumed|strong="H0398"\w* him and his \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w*.

¶ And he \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w again|strong="H7725"\w* a \w captain|strong="H8269"\w* of the \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* with his \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w*. And the \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w captain|strong="H8269"\w* of \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* went \w up|strong="H5927"\w*, and \w came|strong="H0935"\w* and \w fell|strong="H3766"\w* on his \w knees|strong="H1290"\w* \w before|strong="H5048"\w* \w Elijah|strong="H0452"\w*, and \w besought|strong="H2603"\w* him, and \w said|strong="H1696"\w* unto him, O \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, I pray thee, let my \w life|strong="H5315"\w*, and the \w life|strong="H5315"\w* of these \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* thy \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, be \w precious|strong="H3365"\w* in thy \w sight|strong="H5869"\w*.\f + \fr 1.13 \ft fell: Heb. bowed\f*

Behold, there \w came|strong="H3381"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* from \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*, and burnt \w up|strong="H0398"\w* the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w captains|strong="H8269"\w* of the \w former|strong="H7223"\w* \w fifties|strong="H2572"\w* with their \w fifties|strong="H2572"\w*: therefore let my \w life|strong="H5315"\w* now be \w precious|strong="H3365"\w* in thy \w sight|strong="H5869"\w*.

And the \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Elijah|strong="H0452"\w*, Go \w down|strong="H3381"\w* with him: be not \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w* of \w him|strong="H6440"\w*. And he \w arose|strong="H6965"\w*, and went \w down|strong="H3381"\w* with him unto the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.

And he \w said|strong="H1696"\w* unto him, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, Forasmuch as thou hast \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w* to \w enquire|strong="H1875"\w* of \w Baal-zebub|strong="H1176"\w* the \w god|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Ekron|strong="H6138"\w*, \add is it\add* not because \add there is\add* no \w God|strong="H0430"\w* in \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* to \w enquire|strong="H1875"\w* of his \w word|strong="H1697"\w*? therefore thou shalt not come \w down|strong="H3381"\w* off that \w bed|strong="H4296"\w* on which thou art gone \w up|strong="H5927"\w*, but shalt \w surely|strong="H4191"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*.

¶ So he \w died|strong="H4191"\w* according to the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* which \w Elijah|strong="H0452"\w* had \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w*. And \w Jehoram|strong="H3088"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* in his stead in the \w second|strong="H8147"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of \w Jehoram|strong="H3088"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*; because he had no \w son|strong="H1121"\w*.

Now the \w rest|strong="H3499"\w* of the \w acts|strong="H1697"\w* of \w Ahaziah|strong="H0274"\w* which he \w did|strong="H6213"\w*, \add are\add* they not \w written|strong="H3789"\w* in the \w book|strong="H5612"\w* of the \w chronicles|strong="H1697"\w* of the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*?
